val.desc: Works when model ('value') is Array. It tells QCheckbox which value should add/remove when ticked/unticked

true-value.desc: What model value should be considered as checked/ticked?

false-value.desc: What model value should be considered as unchecked/unticked?

indeterminate-value.desc: What model value should be considered as 'indeterminate'?

toggle-indeterminate.desc: When user clicks/taps on QCheckbox, should we toggle through the indeterminate state too?

label.desc: Label to display along the checkbox (or use the default slot instead of this prop)
examples: I agree with the Terms and Conditions

left-label.desc: Label (if any specified) should be displayed on the left side of the checkbox

keep-color.desc: Should the color (if specified any) be kept when checkbox is unticked?

default.desc: Default slot can be used as label, unless 'label' prop is specified; Suggestion: string
